'''Glacial Heart''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The description is incomplete. Additional elemental particles will also drop if Frostgnaw hits enemies that are already {{Color|Cryo|Frozen}}.
*Each {{Color|Cryo|Frozen}} enemy grants 1 additional particle. Freezing two or more enemies is required to produce the maximum of 2 additional particles.

==Trivia==
*In the Chinese name for this talent, {{zh|冰渊之心}}, the phrase {{zh|[https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%86%B0%E6%B8%8A/177254 冰渊]}} is a metaphor for a dangerous situation, as if walking on thin ice over an abyss. The original English name, Heart of the Abyss, made it easy to conflate the "abyss" part of the metaphor with [[the Abyss]], a location in the game with major story significance. In [[Version 1.2]], the English name was adjusted to remove this unintended reference.
